java.lang.Object
be.helha.gdprapp.controllers.RoleController

    • getAllRoles

      @GetMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Role>> getAllRoles()

    • getRoleById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Role> getRoleById(@PathVariable Integer id)

    • getRoleByName

      @GetMapping("/name/{roleName}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Role> getRoleByName(@PathVariable String roleName)

    • createRole

      @PostMapping @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createRole(@RequestBody Role role)

    • updateRole

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateRole(@PathVariable Integer id, @RequestBody Role roleDetails)

    • deleteRole

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteRole(@PathVariable Integer id)

    • getUsersCountByRole

      @GetMapping("/{id}/users/count") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Long> getUsersCountByRole(@PathVariable Integer id)

      @GetMapping("/statistics") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleService.RoleStatistics> getRoleStatistics()

    • getAllRoleNames

      @GetMapping("/names") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or hasRole('GERANT')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getAllRoleNames()

    • createDefaultRoles

      @PostMapping("/init-defaults") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createDefaultRoles()

      @GetMapping("/validate/{roleName}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> validateRoleName(@PathVariable String roleName)
